name: NERC CIP
description: North American Electric Reliability Corporation Critical Infrastructure Protection Standards

deliverables.title: CIP-002 - BES Cyber System Categorization
deliverables.description: Identify and categorize BES Cyber Systems and assets
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hosts

deliverables.title: CIP-003 - Security Management Controls
deliverables.description: Test implementation of security management controls

deliverables.title: CIP-004 - Personnel & Training
deliverables.description: Assess personnel risk assessments and access management

deliverables.title: CIP-005 - Electronic Security Perimeters
deliverables.description: Test ESP boundaries, access points, and remote access security
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%firewall%' OR title LIKE '%perimeter%' OR title LIKE '%remote access%'

deliverables.title: CIP-006 - Physical Security
deliverables.description: Assess physical security of BES Cyber Systems

deliverables.title: CIP-007 - System Security Management
deliverables.description: Test ports/services, security patches, malicious code prevention
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM services

deliverables.title: CIP-008 - Incident Reporting
deliverables.description: Test Cyber Security Incident response capabilities

deliverables.title: CIP-009 - Recovery Plans
deliverables.description: Assess recovery plan for BES Cyber Systems

deliverables.title: CIP-010 - Configuration Management
deliverables.description: Test baseline configurations and vulnerability assessments
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%misconfiguration%' OR title LIKE '%CVE%'

deliverables.title: CIP-011 - Information Protection
deliverables.description: Test information protection and secure handling of BES Cyber System Information
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%data%' OR title LIKE '%information%' OR title LIKE '%disclosure%'
